title: Raising the Flaming Flags of War - Novel Updates
tags: Army Building   Calm Protagonist   Charismatic Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Determined Protagonist   Domestic Affairs   Hard-Working Protagonist   Heroes   Leadership   Loyal Subordinates   Male Protagonist   Management   Military   Multiple POV   Nobles   Politics   Previous Life Talent   Reincarnation   Religions   Royalty   Schemes And Conspiracies   S*aves   Strategic Battles   Strategist   Time Skip   Wars
author: Kasugamaru   かすがまる
description: The hero had been killed during battle, a man was sentenced to death by burning at the stake. The man's death had saved the kingdom's dilemma, and brought peace to the continent. Time flows on, and one mysterious child was born in the countryside. His name is Marco. As war broke out once more, leading an army, he had rose to prominence, bearing an appearance resembling the man who had been killed inside the fire.>
